- Hallo Universität Newcastle! Sie können mit Ihrem Uni-Benutzernamen und Passwort in uTalk einzuloggen, tippen Sie einfach auf "Login" und dann "Academic Login"
- Bug-Fixes und Verbesserungen

Hallo Stadtbibliothek Verden! Tippen Sie auf "Login", dann "Lerner Login", um den Zugang zu uTalk zu erhalten.
Neue Features:
- Neue Animationen, wenn Sie das Ende eines Spiels erreichen. Versuchen Sie, 100 Prozent zu erreichen
- Download Fortschrittsanzeige
- Bug-Fixes und Geschwindigkeitsverbesserungen, einschließlich Verbesserungen im Offline-Modus.

support@utalk.com | +44 (0)207 371 7711 | @utalk

Hallo Stadtbibliothek Verden! Tippen Sie auf "Login", dann "Lerner Login", um den Zugang zu uTalk zu erhalten.
Neue Features:
- Neue Animationen, wenn Sie das Ende eines Spiels erreichen. Versuchen Sie, 100 Prozent zu erreichen
- Download Fortschrittsanzeige
- Bug-Fixes und Geschwindigkeitsverbesserungen, einschließlich Verbesserungen im Offline-Modus.

support@utalk.com | +44 (0)207 371 7711 | @utalk

New features:
- Fixed a bug that could sometimes cause the wrong phrases to be asked when you tapped on an image
- Fixed a bug that could stop you playing the hard or memory game in three topics
- New animations when you reach the end of a game. Try scoring 100%
- Download progress screen
- Bug fixes and speed improvements, including fixes to offline mode.
- Hello Verden Library! Tap “Login”, then “Student Login” to access uTalk.

Bug fixes and improvements

hello@utalk.com | @utalk | +44 (0)207 371 7711

Bug fixes and improvements

hello@utalk.com | @utalk | +44 (0)207 371 7711

• Added a new topic, 'Starter Words', containing the absolute essentials. And we've made it free, in every language, for everyone!
• Two new immersive topics available - Alphabet and a special 'language specific' topic.
• Subscribers get these included free in every language, otherwise they're just 40 uCoins each.
• Faster loading times, and interface improvements.
• Bug fixes, including one which stopped Bluetooth headphones working.

This is our biggest update yet, with loads of new features and enhancements.
Like it? Please leave us a review! Problems? Email hello@utalk.com or tweet @utalk

- Starter words in every language are now free for everyone.
- Fixed a bug which could make it seem like languages you owned weren't unlocked. This was scary and unnecessary - sorry about this!
- We've made improvements to how we list your purchased topics so that things are in a more sensible order.

This is our biggest update yet, with loads of new features and enhancements.

• Added a new language - Québécois. Subscribers get all new languages included at no extra cost, hooray!
• Bug Fixes
• More Libraries and Universities added as login options

If you have any questions, suggestions or have found a bug, get in touch on the details below and we'll be happy to help.

hello@utalk.com | @utalk | +44 (0)207 371 7711

• Fixed an issue that made Hebrew text display back to front. As uTalk doesn't come with a mirror, we thought we should fix this ASAP.
• Fixed an issue that could cause uTalk to freeze after unlocking your device - never a fun thing to happen.
• Sometimes, if you tried to log in as a student, but then changed your mind, uTalk would freeze. This has been fixed - change your mind as often as you like.
• Numerous other small fixes and improvements

If you have any questions, suggestions or have found a bug, get in touch on the details below and we'll be happy to help.

hello@utalk.com | @utalk | +44 (0)207 371 7711

• Fixed an issue that made Hebrew text display back to front. As uTalk doesn't come with a mirror, we thought we should fix this ASAP.
• Fixed an issue that could cause uTalk to freeze after unlocking your device - never a fun thing to happen.
• Sometimes, if you tried to log in as a student, but then changed your mind, uTalk would freeze. This has been fixed - change your mind as often as you like.
• Numerous other small fixes and improvements

If you have any questions, suggestions or have found a bug, get in touch on the details below and we'll be happy to help.

• Numerous other small fixes and improvements

hello@utalk.com | @utalk | +44 (0)207 371 7711

We've been working hard on this uTalk update and hope you like it!

Some of the highlights:

• Sound effects now muted when your phone is in silent mode
• Try out starter words and the uTalk method FREE with no login needed! Like it? Create a free account to save progress and earn free uCoins to carry on learning
• Brand new languages, FREE for subscribers
• We remember your uTalk password so you don't have to
• Use FaceID or TouchID to autofill your login details
• Greatly improved performance of offline mode, and detecting switches between online and offline mode
• More efficient compression, meaning uTalk content takes up less space on your phone and uses less data to download
• New supported library logins for our friends in Sweden
• Fixed a bug which stopped certain topics showing up, even though you'd already bought them
• Fixed a bug causing a small number of subscribers to be asked for uCoins

hello@utalk.com | @utalk | +44 (0)207 371 7711

We've been working hard on this uTalk update and hope you like it!

Some of the highlights:

• Sound effects now muted when your phone is in silent mode
• Try out starter words and the uTalk method FREE with no login needed! Like it? Create a free account to save progress and earn free uCoins to carry on learning
• Brand new languages, FREE for subscribers
• We remember your uTalk password so you don't have to
• Use FaceID or TouchID to autofill your login details
• Greatly improved performance of offline mode, and detecting switches between online and offline mode
• More efficient compression, meaning uTalk content takes up less space on your phone and uses less data to download
• New supported library logins for our friends in Sweden
• Fixed a bug which stopped certain topics showing up, even though you'd already bought them
• Fixed a bug causing a small number of subscribers to be asked for uCoins

hello@utalk.com | @utalk | +44 (0)207 371 7711

- Change text size: choose from normal, large or largest in the settings menu. As one of our most requested features we're really pleased to make this available to all customers.
- Listen to music in the background while learning
- Improved phrasebook search to make it even faster and remember your search queries
- Big under the hood changes to improve performance on all devices and operating systems
- Autoplay in phrase practice now loops around - perfect if you like leaving this on in the background

Got a question, spotted a bug that needs squashing or need advice? We'd love to hear from you at support@utalk.com

• Fixed a problem that could stop offline mode working.
• Scrolling in the language menu is now silky smooth
• Fixed a problem with the speaking game that could cause the recording to sound like 1950's radio. This nostalgic bug has now been removed.
• Made a mistake with your email address? You can now change it, right in the app settings
• If you want to mute sound effects, there's now a setting for this too. Preferences are synced across your devices, so you only need to do this once.
• More detail on download screens explaining exactly how much data is about to be downloaded.

If you have a problem, tell us! We want to fix it for you, and will do our very best to help.
If you like uTalk, please leave a review, it makes the whole office smile when we read them :)

You’ve asked for it and now it’s here - our new Phrasebook feature! Use the search mode to find and listen to a phrase. Save your favourites for quick offline access. Your choice of words at your fingertips. Available only for subscribers or whole-language owners.

Got a question, spotted a bug that needs squashing or need advice? We’d love to hear from you at support@utalk.com
